channel.title: Lagg
channel.description: how do i actually reduce lag will making a smaller boolean process work? will deleting stuff in client.java that i dont need work? any other ways?

item.title: Lagg
item.dc:creator: @frugoo_scape frugoo scape
item.description:
@frugoo_scape wrote:

[quote=“BurnInSilence, post:1, topic:178550”]how do i actually reduce lag
will making a smaller boolean process work?
will deleting stuff in client.java that i dont need work?
any other ways?[/quote]
Stop using a client.java and use multiple loops instead of one big one. Also make all data static that does not need to be created.

Read full topic
